title: Ik wil graag weer E mail kunnen ontvangen en versturen
content: Ik heb geen vraag, maar vindt het allemaal erg ingewikkeld. Ik ben 81 jaar. Ik wil weer e mail ontvangen en versturen. Met vriendelijke groet, D.Mik
creator: geda2006

title: Two gmail accounts, same settings, can only get IMAP mail from one
content:
I use 2 different gmail accounts for different purposes. I get mail for AccountA via IMAP on Thunderbird, no problem, and have for years. For over a year now I've been unable to collect mail for my second-string address, AccountB, on Thunderbird, and have had to get it in the browser.

I've finally decided to do something about this. I removed AccountB from Thunderbird & set it up again. I'm using the exact same settings (in Thunderbird and in Gmail) that I do for AccountA, the only difference is the password. I've double-checked the password, too. But when I try to connect, I get a pop-up:

titled: Enter credentials for AccountB@gmail.com on imap.gmail.com [a very long URL which I've copied & saved] page from Google:

400. That's an error. The server cannot process the request because it is malformed. It should not be retried. That's all we know.

Thanks a heap, guys!

Is this problem coming from Thunderbird, or from Google? What do I do now?

Thanks,

MEC
creator: curtin.me

title: in my message filtering, how do I specify that an email address exists in my address book
content:
I've set up filters to eliminate all the spam I get, using a White list and a Black list. While that mostly worked, I wanted a better idea. So I got rid of the blacklist, and just have a White list. If any email address isn't in the White list, I want the email to be automatically transferred to the Junk emal folder.

The concept seems to work, except that I want to also accept all email in my address book when it falls thru the whitelist filter, but I don't know how to specify this. Is it possible?
creator: Don-Peters

title: file recovery after crash
content:
My PC's hard drive crashed and took TBird's data files with it.

However, I created an email backup on an external drive two days earlier. It consists of two folders full of files .

They are: maocg35b.default tcv0srue.default-release

I downloaded Thunderbird from this site and installed it. If someone reading this is absolutely certain how to get the new installation to incorporate these data files, please respond with directions.
creator: larry41

title: My PC was crushed, how to connect with new PC?
content:
Hello, My PC was crushed suddenly. I cannot the PC on again. Then I installed the Thunderbird to another PC and succussed, but I cannot catch the e-mail. Message on the inbox, no mail is found.

How can I connect again with new PC? Please tell me.

Sincerely
creator: hattori.kei.b0

title: Donation
content:
I thought Thunderbird was free to use. It's asking me to donate and I can't access my current emails from my account. If this is free than why on earth do I HAVE to donate to get access to my emails. That is not right. Please help me.

Thank you Malcolm
creator: mmaxwel2002
